titleStmt.title: A suruey of the great dukes state of Tuscany In the yeare of our Lord 1596.
titleStmt.author: Dallington, Robert, 1561-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Eld] for Edward Blount,

notesStmt.note: The name of the author, Robert Dallington, appears on A2r.
Running title reads: A suruey of the great dukes state of Tuscanie.
In this edition p. 27 is correctly paged; in imprint, the "E" of "Edward" is under the first "n" of "London".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
